basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. Joe Ahmadifar Endowed Scholarship in Occupational Safety
basic_information.committee_name: The Dr. Joe Ahmadifar Endowed Scholarship in Occup

description: To provide scholarship assistance to students majoring in Industrial or Occupational Safety. Eligibility Requirements Must be an Occupational Safety major at UCO Must be in good academic standing with the department Must demonstrate financial need Preference will be given to international student applicants Preference will also be given to student applicants with English as a second language Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_College is Education and Prof Studies
criteria.raw_text: SIS_College is Education and Prof Studies

criteria.description: SIS_Major is Industrial Safety   or SIS_Major is Occupational Safety
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Major is Industrial Safety   or SIS_Major is Occupational Safety

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration
